reviews.review_msg: Professor Everton is one of the best professors at SFU. He really takes care and consdieration iinto his students and genuinely wants everyone to succeed. He helped me improve my writing so much and get over the initial anxiety of starting a paper. I enjoyed every minute of his class and would take any class just to have him be my prof again.

Mike is just one of those professors that you wish you'd met in your first year. He's passionate, outgoing, and helpful--making even the 800 page Moby Dick seem approachable and even (dare I say it) enjoyable. His was the first paper I got a C on, and the first A I truly appreciated. Truly a great professor.
